result.title: Topics to learn and interesting hard problems on them
result.content:
Convex Hull trick https://csacademy.com/contest/round-70/task/squared-ends/

CHT tutorial https://e-maxx-eng.appspot.com/geometry/convex_hull_trick.html

https://www.hackerrank.com/contests/road-to-virtual-reality-world/challenges/brackets-2

This problem is usually solved using a NlogN solution, which won't pass all test cases, please read further into the N solution. Ibraheem's tutorial & Code: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42254365/reverseparentheses-codefights/48963102#48963102 Ownography's Code: https://www.ideone.com/XgBVVk

Suffix array problem : https://csacademy.com/contest/round-73/task/strange-substring/
